page.title: 20THE SCHOOL DAY
page.content:
Morning 8.45a.m.-12.40p.m. Lunch period 12.40p.m.-1.50p.m. Afternoon 1.50p.m.-3.35p.m.
Pupils often remain at school after 3.35p.m. for a variety of reasons, for extra help or for a club activity- occasionally because they have been detainedfor some misdemeanour e.g. lateness, not doing homework or unacceptable behaviour.
Parents are always given 24 hours written notice if a formal detention as a punishment for a serious offence.
ACTIVITIES There is Badminton, Chess, Drama Club, Computing, Table Tennis, Rambling,Art Club, DIY, Trampoline, Swimming Club, Gymnastics, Foreign Exchanges,Visits Abroad and many more like these.
